--- title: "Hockey Analytics" subtitle: "Assignment 5: NHL Player Award Ballots" format: html: toc: true toc-depth: 2 html-math-method: katex code-copy: true code-fold: true code-tools: true execute: warning: false message: false error: false --- In this assignment, I will create data driven ballots for 6 NHL awards, ranking five players per category. These awards such as the Hart Memorial Trophy for MVP, the Vezina Trophy for top goaltender, and the Calder Memorial Trophy for best rookie are determined by subjective voting, but my approach will rely on relevant performance metrics. # Reading the data and basic joins and filtering ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(kableExtra) library(pillar) base_url <- "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/ProfessorPolymorphic/BCB520/main/posts/A5-TabularData/" rookie_goalies <- read_csv(paste0(base_url, "RookieGoalies.csv")) rookie_skaters_ind <- read_csv(paste0(base_url, "RookieSkaterIndividual.csv")) rookie_skaters_onice<- read_csv(paste0(base_url, "RookieSkaterOnIce.csv")) skaters_ind <- read_csv(paste0(base_url, "SkaterIndividualstats.csv")) skaters_onice <- read_csv(paste0(base_url, "SkaterOnIcestats.csv")) ``` ::: ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} all_skaters <- skaters_onice %>% inner_join(skaters_ind, by = c("Player", "Team", "Position", "GP")) rookie_skaters <- rookie_skaters_onice %>% inner_join(rookie_skaters_ind, by = c("Player", "Team", "Position", "GP")) ``` ::: # Hart Memorial Trophy This is for player most valuable to the team. The criteria I will use is total points per game in at least 30 games played. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} mvp_candidates <- all_skaters %>% filter(GP >= 30) %>% mutate(PPG = `Total Points` / GP) %>% arrange(desc(PPG)) %>% select(Player, Team, Position, GP, `Total Points`, PPG) #ballot mvp_top5 <- head(mvp_candidates, 5) ``` ::: # Vezina Trophy This is for the top goaltender. I will use saves and goals against as metrics. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} vezina_candidates <- rookie_goalies %>% filter(GP >= 30) %>% mutate(SavePercentage = Saves / (Saves + `Goals Against`)) %>% arrange(desc(SavePercentage)) %>% select(Player, Team, GP, Saves, `Goals Against`, SavePercentage) #ballot vezina_top5 <- head(vezina_candidates, 5) ``` ::: # Calder Memorial Trophy This is for rookie of the year, the most proficient player in his first year of competition. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} calder_candidates <- rookie_skaters %>% filter(GP >= 30) %>% mutate(PPG = `Total Points` / GP) %>% arrange(desc(PPG)) %>% select(Player, Team, Position, GP, `Total Points`, PPG) #ballot calder_top5 <- head(calder_candidates, 5) ``` ::: # James Norris Memorial Trophy This is awarded to the defenseman with the greatest all around ability. I will filter by Position == "D" and use a hypothetical Impact metric, which will be the total of points and assists relative to time on ice. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} norris_candidates <- all_skaters %>% filter(Position == "D", GP >= 30) %>% mutate(Impact = (`Total Points` + `Total Assists`) / TOI.x) %>% arrange(desc(Impact)) %>% select(Player, Team, GP, `Total Points`, `Total Assists`, Impact) #ballot norris_top5 <- head(norris_candidates, 5) ``` ::: # Frank J. Selke Trophy This is for the forwards player who best excels in the defensive aspects of the game. I will be using on ice shot for percentage. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} selke_candidates <- all_skaters %>% filter(Position %in% c("C", "R"), GP >= 30) %>% mutate(DefensiveRating = `SF%`) %>% arrange(desc(DefensiveRating)) %>% select(Player, Team, GP, `Total Points`, `SF%`, DefensiveRating) selke_top5 <- head(selke_candidates, 5) ``` ::: # Lady Byng Memorial Trophy This is for the player who has best sportsmanship while also having a high standard of playing. I will use low penalty minutes (PIM) as a proxy for that. ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} lady_byng_candidates <- all_skaters %>% filter(GP >= 30) %>% mutate(Sportsmanship = ifelse(PIM == 0, 1, 1 / PIM)) %>% arrange(desc(Sportsmanship)) %>% select(Player, Team, GP, PIM, Sportsmanship) #ballot lady_byng_top5 <- head(lady_byng_candidates, 5) ``` ::: # Showing each ballot seprately ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ## Hart Memorial Trophy mvp_top5 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 5 × 6 Player Team Position GP `Total Points` PPG 1 Nikita Kucherov T.B R 57 87 1.53 2 Leon Draisaitl EDM C 60 90 1.5 3 Nathan MacKinnon COL C 61 91 1.49 4 Kirill Kaprizov MIN L 37 52 1.41 5 Connor McDavid EDM C 54 75 1.39 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} ## Vezina Trophy vezina_top5 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 5 × 6 Player Team GP Saves `Goals Against` SavePercentage 1 Logan Thompson WSH 35 904 81 0.918 2 Dustin Wolf CGY 36 980 93 0.913 3 Lukas Dostal ANA 36 1011 100 0.910 4 Joseph Woll TOR 32 833 85 0.907 5 Pyotr Kochetkov CAR 37 835 91 0.902 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} ## Calder Memorial Trophy calder_top5 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 5 × 6 Player Team Position GP `Total Points` PPG 1 Kirill Marchenko CBJ R 57 60 1.05 2 Wyatt Johnston DAL C 60 55 0.917 3 Kent Johnson CBJ C 46 42 0.913 4 Logan Cooley UTA C 54 47 0.870 5 Marco Rossi MIN C 61 51 0.836 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} ## James Norris Memorial Trophy norris_top5 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 5 × 6 Player Team GP `Total Points` `Total Assists` Impact 1 Quinn Hughes VAN 50 60 46 0.0844 2 Shea Theodore VGK 55 48 41 0.0734 3 Cale Makar COL 61 67 45 0.0711 4 Zach Werenski CBJ 59 64 46 0.0693 5 Rasmus Dahlin BUF 51 48 38 0.0692 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} ## Frank J. Selke Trophy selke_top5 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 5 × 6 Player Team GP `Total Points` `SF%` DefensiveRating 1 Jackson Blake CAR 61 22 66.8 66.8 2 Tomas Hertl VGK 60 46 64.5 64.5 3 Nathan MacKinnon COL 61 91 64.1 64.1 4 Leon Draisaitl EDM 60 90 64.0 64.0 5 Connor McDavid EDM 54 75 63.3 63.3 ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} ## Lady Byng Memorial Trophy lady_byng_top5 ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` # A tibble: 5 × 5 Player Team GP PIM Sportsmanship 1 William Karlsson VGK 38 0 1 2 Jimmy Vesey NYR 33 0 1 3 Cole Schwindt VGK 38 0 1 4 Brayden Point T.B 55 2 0.5 5 Anze Kopitar L.A 59 2 0.5 ``` ::: ::: # The ballots in a single table ::: {.cell} ```{.r .cell-code} ballots_combined <- bind_rows( mvp_top5 %>% mutate(Award = "Hart Memorial Trophy", Rank = row_number()), vezina_top5 %>% mutate(Award = "Vezina Trophy", Rank = row_number()), calder_top5 %>% mutate(Award = "Calder Memorial Trophy", Rank = row_number()), norris_top5 %>% mutate(Award = "James Norris Memorial Trophy", Rank = row_number()), selke_top5 %>% mutate(Award = "Frank J. Selke Trophy", Rank = row_number()), lady_byng_top5 %>% mutate(Award = "Lady Byng Memorial Trophy", Rank = row_number()) ) %>% mutate(Voter = "Marwa") %>% select(Voter, Rank, Award, Player) # Display the full table ballots_combined %>% kable("html") %>% kable_styling(full_width = TRUE, bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover", "condensed")) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
